TopicTitle: How to Make Planes Shaped Like Words in KSP

Articles.Content:
I made a tutorial in which I explain how to make a flyable plane shaped like the word "Jeb." Hopefully, you'll find it interesting; bizarre "wordcraft" like this one have been popular in the KSP Facebook community (and possibly here as well) recently. Remember to like, comment, and subscribe to my channel!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2qCz3XzLEWY
